comments: SSCAIT enforces an 85ms frame duration. We set the limit lower due to 16ms timer resolution. We expect enough JVM memory for a framebuffer, but I don't know yet if we can dictate our memory ceiling through run_proxy.bat. This configuration is optimized for the SSCAIT elimination tournament, rather than the round-robin or ongoing ladder. SSCAIT VMs may have either 1 or 2 CPUs.
